previewArticle.title: Argentina vs. Switzerland: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Argentina 1, Switzerland 0: 2014 FIFA World Cup | Round of 16 Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Abigail Ekue
timelineItems.text: Keys to victory: Contain Messi. Set Shaqiri free. We'll see. #ARG #SUI #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Granit Xhaka (Switzerland).
Ángel Di María (Argentina) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: obai
timelineItems.text: Shaqiri embarrassing Argentina defense to the delight of Brazilians & Swiss fans ��� #ARGvsSUI #WorldCup @ESPNFC @espn @FIFAWorldCup

timelineItems.name: GotSoccer
timelineItems.text: Hard earned corner for Swiss. Mehemdi good work, Shaqiri too. Corner wasted. #WorldCup #ARGvsSUI

timelineItems.name: Sameer Yadav
timelineItems.text: Hoping to see some tremendous strikes from #Messi #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Simpo Simukoko
timelineItems.text: #ARGvSUI bring on the penalties already #WorldCup2014

timelineItems.name: Duke of Dystopia
timelineItems.text: That shot, Mr Pearce was not "expansive", it was crap. #ArgvSui

timelineItems.text: Doesn't Shaqiri sound like one of those fancy cocktails? No? Okay. #ARGvSUI

timelineItems.name: Lily Minster
timelineItems.text: #argvsui I want the team in red to win

timelineItems.name: Sam Langan
timelineItems.text: Brazil fans loving this. #SUI out passing #ARG now. Not the first time the ref has got in the way. #ARGvSUI

First Half Extra Time ends, Argentina 0, Switzerland 0.

timelineItems.name: Gavi44Kooner
timelineItems.text: I would say this game is end to end but it's more like 3rd quarter to 3rd quarter . #ARGVSUI

timelineItems.name: David Nine
timelineItems.text: One more half of extra time for #ARGvSUI. Both defenses playing at top level. This game will probably go to penalties
